channel.title: [PI] Cache
channel.description: Whenever I try to change something in a cache and zip it and upload it, when I change the old original link in CacheDownloader.java and Client.java, I compile and then run it, and it gets to the "Loading Cache Library 99%" and when it hits 100%, it says "Error Loading... Please report!".

Rep++'d

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Cache
item.dc:creator: @purestmage74 purestmage74
item.description:
@purestmage74 wrote:

Make sure you’re not zipping the cache folder.

Should be like this.

[EliteDemonsCache.zip]
[sprites]
[raw]
[data]
[models.idx]
[etc…]

I made that mistake of zipping my cache folder it’s self.

You need to go into your cache folder, highlight everything than click “add to archive”.
Than toggle it to “Zip” and it will create a new .zip archive with all the cache contents inside of it, so therefor when it unzips it, it will not hold a secondary folder = wrong path.

Read full topic
